content.query:
CREATE TABLE [subscription-tom-test]([global-paymentmethod:billable] bit,
[global-paymentmethod:company-ni] nvarchar(1000),
[global-paymentmethod:currency] nvarchar(1000),
[global-paymentmethod:description] nvarchar(1000),
[global-paymentmethod:internal] bit,
[global-paymentmethod:name] nvarchar(1000),
[global-paymentmethod:project-ni] nvarchar(1000),
[global-subscription:admin-link] nvarchar(1000) NOT NULL,
[global-subscription:billable] bit NOT NULL,
[global-subscription:data-link] nvarchar(1000) NOT NULL,
[global-subscription:mute] bit NOT NULL,
[global-subscription:name] nvarchar(1000) NOT NULL,
[global-subscription:paymentmethod-ni] nvarchar(1000),
[global-subscription:portal-link] nvarchar(1000) NOT NULL,
[global-subscription:subscription-id] nvarchar(1000) NOT NULL,
[_id] nvarchar(900) NOT NULL,
[global-paymentmethod:fixed_currency] nvarchar(1000),
[global-paymentmethod:fixed_price] int
PRIMARY KEY NONCLUSTERED ([_id]) NOT ENFORCED) WITH (CLUSTERED COLUMNSTORE INDEX, DISTRIBUTION = HASH([_id]))
